programme.desc: Hong Liang and Zheng Ya Ping lead their team in investigating crimes relating to judicial corruption, upholding justice And safeguarding the credibility of the judicial system.

programme.desc: A group of TV celebrities travel together to 7 major cities across 3 Southeast Asian countries; Malaysia, Thailand And the Philippines, showcasing the local culture, customs, traditions And foods.

programme.title: Tuesday Report: Vibrancy at IE
programme.desc: In this 5-episode series, explore Jurong, Bedok, Woodlands, Henderson And Sin Ming industrial estates to unveil facts about the industry that provides opportunities for the people.

programme.title: As Long As We are Together
programme.desc: Chronicling the married life of three couples through anecdotes by the main characters, He Jiaru and Ye Yifan, who moved to a new house for their second child.

programme.title: Hua Hee Seko-lah
programme.desc: In the wake of its popular local Hokkien drama Hua Hee Everyday, Hua Hee Dai presents a new Hokkien comedy, Hua Hee Seko-lah! A teacher, who volunteers to teach Mandarin in a Hokkien village, finds himself up against its Hokkien community whose old habits die hard. Living alongside the villagers, the teacher slowly redirects his hard-headed students towards Mandarin in its purest form, while personally experiencing the beauty of Hokkien culture.

programme.title: Dendam Cinta Arissa
programme.desc: Diana akhrinya mengaku yang dia curang dan meminta Rafael supaya lepaskan dia. Zariman jumpa semula rantai milik Arissa yang hilang bertahun dahulu, rupanya ada dengan kawan baiknya Zaki. Zariman tidak tahu Zaki mencintai Arissa.

programme.title: Dendam Cinta Arissa
programme.desc: Arissa bertambah tertekan bila adiknya Suraya terus mendesak dia beri duit untuk di pergi bercuti dengan kawan-kawan. Zariman mula merasa sedikit curiga melihat kemesraan Zaki dan Arissa. Rafael tidak mahu lepaskan Diana.

programme.title: Rindu Awak Separuh Nyawa
programme.desc: Maisara menawarkan baju melayu yang dibelinya untuk Nazril dulu. Tanpa mengendahkan perasaan Maisara, Nazril terus menyarung baju melayu warna coklat pemberiaan Nurul Huda dan mengatakan dia tidak menyukai baju melayu warna biru. programme.title: Rindu Awak Separuh Nyawa
programme.desc: Maisara naik hantu. Dia menolak, menampar-nampar dan menarik tudung Nurul Huda. Dia tidak peduli kalau Nurul Huda mahu mendapatkan Nazril, tapi dia tidak suka diburuk-burukkan oleh Nurul Huda. Nazril pula menuduh Maisara bukan-bukan.

programme.title: Rindu Awak Separuh Nyawa
programme.desc: Nurul Huda sakit hati melihat kemesraan Nazril dan Maisara, dan Puan Norida yang terlalu gembira dengan hubungan anak dan menantunya yang semakin pulih. Nurul Huda mengapi-apikan Kak Esah dengan mengatakan ada penipuan terbesar Maisara yang akan membantu mereka sisihkan Maisara.

programme.title: Rindu Awak Separuh Nyawa
programme.desc: Nurul Huda menasihati Nazril supaya tidak teruskan penipuan itu atau dia yang akan sampaikan sendiri dekat Puan Norida. Nurul Huda mempersoalkan sampai bila Nazril hendak menyiksa diri kerana dia tahu Nazril tidak bahagia bersama Maisara.

programme.title: Brocade Odyssey
programme.desc: After a family crisis, Ji Ying Ying defies adversity to preserve her familys secret dyeing techniques. She brings brocades unique methods to the Silk Road, eventually being honored by Tang Dynasty.

programme.title: The Day
programme.desc: The Day presents the past 24 hours: close to the people, with a clear focus on the essential issue, and guests who outline their viewpoints on the stories of the day.

programme.title: Jihan Nak Displin Anak
programme.desc: Jihan dan suami kalut apabila anak mereka tidak mahu pulang beraya di kampung. Mereka cuba untuk mendisiplinkan anak mereka sebelum hari raya

programme.title: Satu Kampung Dua Orang
programme.desc: Selepas banjir besar melanda, semua penduduk kampung berpindah kerana kampung mereka tidak lagi selamat. Hanya dua beradik yang enggan berpindah atas sebab dan alasan mereka tersendiri.

programme.title: Jamil Balik Kampung
programme.desc: Kisah perjalanan Jamil pulang ke kampung untuk meminang kekasihnya setelah pinangannya pernah ditolak beberapa kali. Berjayakah misi Jamil kali ini?

programme.title: Sampai Nanti
programme.desc: Kyle dan Milly bertemu kembali setelah 10 tahun terpisah dan cinta lama kembali terjalin. Tetapi adakah cinta mereka akan terus kekal hingga ke akhirnya?

programme.title: Asam Pedas Cendol Sejoli
programme.desc: Karim adalah pemilik kedai cendol bersebelahan dengan kedai asam pedas Kalsom. Mereka bermusuhan, tetapi anak mereka Kinah dan Khalil mencintai satu sama lain, dan terpaksa menyembunyikan perkara ini bagi mengelakkan perang antara dua kedai mereka.

programme.title: Tolong Saya Encik Dinosaur
programme.desc: Elly berpindah dari bandar ke pekan kecil untuk mencari ketenangan. Tetapi kenangan buruk tetap menghantui dirinya, sehinggalah dia bertemu dengan Karl yang mengajarnya erti sebuah kebahagiaan.

programme.title: Cubit - Cubit Cinta
programme.desc: Kupid Cubit is a dating app that enables the masses to find love. But for Katarina and Saiful, its a platform for healing people with unrequited love.

programme.title: Duit Kawin
programme.desc: Memaparkan pemikiran remaja sekarang terhadap perkahwinan dari sudut kos atas syariat agama tetapi tertekan cara hidup zaman kini yang mahukan kemewahan.

programme.title: Biarkan Cinta Tersenyum Lagi
programme.desc: Kisah penulis lagu Maya Arisa yang menghidap tumor otak dan mengimpikan untuk berkahwin. Dia kemudiannya bertemu dengan seorang jurugambar bernama Redza.

programme.title: Ayat Dari Langit
programme.desc: Ustaz Muiz dan isterinya mengajar ajaran sesat dan mahu pengikutnya mengikut telunjuk mereka yang lama kelamaan mula membuatkan pengikutnya bernama Kamal mula merasa sangsi.

programme.title: Cinta Round 1
programme.desc: Farid is a nerdy guy who always been bullied by Syakirin, his senior. Farid determined to enter an MMA tournament organized by their university so to put an end to being bullied by Syakirin.

programme.title: Racun Suami Jahanam
programme.desc: Suraya is a naive village girl who looks forward to happy days when Hazrul proposes to her. But those happy days are only temporary when she learns who Hazrul really is.

programme.title: Well be back at 6.00am
programme.desc: Well be back at 6.00am

programme.title: 6 Hari
programme.desc: Suzi is content with being a third wife and living alone in her bungalow as she only entertains her husband every 6 days. Everything comes crashing when a person from her past returns to her life.

programme.title: Please Subscribe Cintaku
programme.desc: Hannah and her friend Alia have gone to an abandoned construction site to find material for her YouTube channel, but she unknowingly records a murder.

programme.title: Diva Dari Jakarta
programme.desc: Erin dan Ejot sering dibandingkan dari segi paras rupa. Sehingga suatu hari sesuatu telah berlaku kepada Erin yang mengubah segalanya.

programme.title: Diam Tanda Setuju
programme.desc: Kisah dua sahabat baik yang berhadapan dengan konflik perhubungan di saat mereka mula panik memikirkan usia mereka yang semakin meningkat tetapi belum bertemu jodoh.

programme.title: Nasiya
programme.desc: Ketika melarikan diri dari bekas suaminya, Ihyana telah mengalami kemalangan tetapi dia bernasib baik kerana telah diselamatkan oleh satu entiti luar biasa yang telah mengubah kelakuannya.

programme.title: Suamiku Encik Beruang
programme.desc: Ani, the most beautiful girl in the village, who is ever mans fantasy, decides to marry Mr. Bear as her husband, much to everyones surprise. As for the chief village, he intend to organise the "wedding of the year".

programme.title: Menanti Hari Itu
programme.desc: Kisah kasih sayang seorang ibu terhadap anak kandungnya yang tidak pernah terpadam meskipun si anak menjauhkan diri akibat hasutan keluarga angkatnya sendiri.

programme.title: Kecundang Sebelum Menjanda
programme.desc: Hari terbahagia dalam hidup Nora berubah menjadi suram bila tunangnya menarik diri pada hari pernikahan mereka. Tambah buruk lagi, hari selepas tragedi itu asyik berulang atas sebab-sebab misteri.

programme.title: Aku Raja Lawak
programme.desc: Silah nak jadi pelawak yang terkenal, cuma di kampungnya tak ada peluang pekerjaan pelawak sepenuh masa. Tapi dia tetap mendapat sokongan padu daripada peminat nombor satunya iaitu Faris, anaknya.

programme.title: Bayangan Emilia
programme.desc: Rita berpindah masuk ke banglo Ungku Mahmud dan mula merasai akan kehadiran roh yang seperti tidak senang dengan kehadirannya disitu. Apakah misteri di sebalik rumah banglo tersebut?

programme.title: Oh Speak English Please
programme.desc: Kisah Sally anak remaja moden yang merasa malu dengan ibunya kerana tidak pandai berbahasa Inggeris dan berketrampilan agak kekampungan. Lakonan Rozita Che Wan dan Zahirah MacWilson.

programme.title: Striker Hati Ayah
programme.desc: Sofia susah untuk memilih antara dua calon, Raf atau Noah. Lalu meminta pendapat ayahnya, Adam. Kini dua lelaki tersebut terpaksa memenangi hati ayah Sofia, seorang peminat fanatik bola.

programme.title: Gebu Gebu Manis
programme.desc: Kisah Hamdi dan Dolah yang memulakan perniagaan dodol tetapi sering disabotaj oleh Amira yang cemburu dengan perniagaan dua orang sahabat ini.

programme.title: Well be back at 6.00am
programme.desc: Well be back at 6.00am

programme.title: Wartawan Kampung
programme.desc: Mustaqim yang tidak habis belajar, pulang ke kampung mewujudkan laman web kampung disokong Tok Ketua Kampung Kambing. Untuk mempopularkan laman web itu, Mak Jah dan Mak Temah dilantik menjadi wartawan kampung untuk bahagian berita gosip dan hangat yang merancang untuk merampas laman web itu untuk kepunyaan sendiri. Akhirnya, berita menjadi finah, kampung pula menjadi porak-poranda.

programme.title: Lukisan Cinta
programme.desc: Mengisahkan Khairul dan Natasha saling mencintai tetapi ditentang bapa Natasha kerana Khairul memilih kerjaya sebagai pelukis. Apakah kesudahan cinta mereka?

programme.title: Arts24

programme.title: News
programme.desc: An international news bulletin, presented live from the newsroom.

programme.title: In Isolation
programme.desc: Four friends wanted to get away from it all in a remote country house but when a mysterious injured man turns up on their doorstep telling tales of a city ravaged by a epidemic and the looters who have pursued him, the friends rally to help.

programme.title: American Sicario
programme.desc: Based on the true story, Edgar Valdez, drug lord and cartel leader, is betrayed by one of the brothers. Seeking retribution, Valdez will risk it all to gain control of the Feliz cartel.

programme.title: Blowback
programme.desc: After planning a perfect heist, Nick is ready to score. One problem, his girl and the crew, have other ideas. They take Nick down in a hail of bullets but Nick doesnt die and in a race for his life, seeks revenge one target at a time.

programme.title: Operation Sea Wolf
programme.desc: The German Navy and the last remaining U-Boats, were formed together for one last mission to attack the United States Homeland.

programme.title: Mojave Diamonds
programme.desc: A former MMA fighter and his brothers must rescue their kidnapped family from a dangerous crime syndicate after $50M of illegal diamonds gets stolen.

programme.title: Mister Mayfair - Serenas Game
programme.desc: Refusing to comply with Tommys demands, Max and Paul conspire to have the British gangster eliminated and Serena arrested. With Tommy dead and Serena in handcuffs, it appears as though Max has succeeded. His plan goes awry, however, when MI6 force Max to help Serena bring down her employers: the Russian mob. Torn between a life of crime with Serena or happiness with Ava, nothing is ever simple in the life of Max Mayfair.

programme.title: Heartbreakers
programme.desc: Max and Page, a brilliant mother-daughter swindler team, target the citys wealthiest men. Max marries them and then sues for alimony after she catches them involved in an affair with Page.

programme.title: The Legion
programme.desc: Noreno, a half-Roman, is entrusted with the mission of crossing the snowy mountains of Armenia, swarming with Parthian patrols, to seek help for his slowly dying men.

programme.title: Override
programme.desc: In 2040, a female humanoid A.I. is hacked by her husband and forced to kidnap the U.S. vice presidents son and execute him on live television.

programme.title: Escape Through Africa
programme.desc: Following a violent raid on her outpost, a British nurse, Anne is on the run with a small group of soldiers. She must balance bravery with compassion to save a native girl, her husband, and her colony.

programme.title: In Isolation
programme.desc: Four friends wanted to get away from it all in a remote country house but when a mysterious injured man turns up on their doorstep telling tales of a city ravaged by a epidemic and the looters who have pursued him, the friends rally to help.

programme.title: A Tale Of Two Guns
programme.desc: A deputized gunslinger takes up the call to hunt down the last Cowboy, the chase is on and the bullets fly and only one of these hardened men can survive.

programme.title: Rat Race
programme.desc: A Las Vegas casino magnate, determined to find a new avenue for wagering, sets up a race for money.

programme.title: Altitude
programme.desc: A female FBI agent is offered millions to help a thief escape from a hijacked airplane.

programme.title: Clean
programme.desc: Tormented by his criminal past, Clean attempts a quiet life caring for his community and as a mentor to his young neighbor Dianda. When local gang violence puts his neighbors life in danger, Clean finds himself returning to his violent past.

programme.title: Come Out Fighting
programme.desc: During WWII, the American army have raced their way through the countryside on the border of France entering Nazi Germany. Hitler has deployed his secret weapon. Lieutenant Frank Ross encounters the Nazi weapon and an intense aerial battle ensues.

programme.title: Broken Star
programme.desc: Abandoned by her friends and family and with her career in jeopardy, starlet Markey Marlowe is sequestered in a duplex with a reclusive landlord who just may be more dangerous than she is.

programme.title: Crom
programme.desc: High school teenagers accidentally unleash an ancient Irish entity on their hometown and must stop it before midnight on Halloween.

programme.title: Locked In
programme.desc: A single mother must protect her daughter and herself during a heist gone wrong at a high-tech storage facility.

programme.title: Broadcast
programme.desc: After a billionaire creates a drug called INOC which stops the aging process, the future of a world where death no longer exists is seen. The story of the fate of mankind is told while also revealing an elusive truth to its unknowing spectator.

programme.title: Project Legion
programme.desc: A young man trapped in his apartment with a swarm of demons outside his door must find a way to survive the night and escape from apartment 213.

programme.title: Any Bullet Will Do
programme.desc: Two Brothers find themselves on opposing sides of the fight as one hopes to help abolish slavery while the other believes it is his God-given right.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement
programme.desc: Hayes Hodges, an attorney, takes up the offer of defending his friend Colonel Terry Childers, accused of ordering his squad to open fire on a group of demonstrators.

programme.title: Pocket Listing
programme.desc: Double crosses, adultery, murder, mistaken identity, and revenge ensue when a mysterious power player and his sultry wife hire a disgraced Los Angeles property broker to discreetly market and sell their Malibu villa.

programme.title: High Voltage
programme.desc: After a lightning strike kills the lead singer of a band, she is resurrected with electrifying special abilities.

programme.title: Blood Of Redemption
programme.desc: When the most powerful criminal empire in the land comes crumbling down from within, it is up to a former henchman to put the puzzle pieces together in order to find those responsible and extract revenge.

programme.title: Mister Mayfair - A Song To Kill For
programme.desc: Max Mayfair has it all; a beautiful girlfriend, Ava, a new London crime family, and thanks to his latest heist, a priceless diamond necklace. However, when mafioso Calbones henchmen catch up with Mike and Armen, determined to drag them back to New York to pay for their crimes, Max has everything to lose. Teaming up with his old friend, Marseille Mafia crime boss, Paul, Max hatches a plan to lure the New York Mafia to Mayfair.

programme.title: Hunting Games
programme.desc: Two dangerous armed men must hunt each other and fight to death over millions of dollars in cash in this high octane wilderness survival story.

programme.title: Centigrade
programme.desc: A married couple find themselves trapped in their frozen vehicle after a blizzard and struggle to survive amid plunging temperatures and unforeseen obstacles.

programme.title: Mister Mayfair - The Spyce Of Life
programme.desc: Returning from a romantic getaway with Ava, Max finds himself on the wrong side of the law yet again. Now blackmailed by MI6, Max must spy on two suspected terrorists; Aziz and Omar, who are regular customers at his club. Accompanied by his London crime family, Max breaks into Omars country estate and discovers his sinister plan. With everything on the line, Max must race to uncover a highly skilled hackers identity before its too late.

programme.title: China
programme.desc: In China, Rooftop and Catfish continue their East Asian adventures. As if the leeches in Indonesia werent enough, the bikers move on to bee sting therapy in China, strengthen their stomachs with some grasshoppers and mice wine, and attempt to transport hundreds of pounds of fish on nothing but a bike and sheer will power. The duo also undergo a hike of Chinese mountain Hua Shan, electro acupuncture, and kung fu train, all to be able to endure dim mak, the death touch. Can Rooftop and Catfish handle this intense physical journey, or will the death touch get the best of them?

programme.title: Northern Territory
programme.desc: In Kakadu National Park, Andy joins Dewayne Webb foraging pandanus and cooking Seared Buffalo with Pandanus And Charred Herb Salsa over an open fire. He then heads to Darwin, assisting Zach Green at Elijahs Kitchen, a food truck offering indigenous-inspired meals like Magpie Goose and Crocodile Laksa. Returning to Kakadu, Andy goes fishing with local Barramundi expert Rob Johnson and prepares Paperbark Leaf BBQ Barramundi with Sour Tamarind Sauce at Anbangbang Billabong, showcasing the regions environment and produce.

programme.title: Stirling - First War of Scottish Independence
programme.desc: This time on River Hunters, in the shadow of Stirling Castle, presenter and wild swimming loving Rick Edwards and real life river hunter Beau Ouimette, tackle the mighty river Forth. In the first archaeological river search of this spot ever, theyll be hunting for relics of Scotlands greatest medieval warriors William Wallace and Robert The Bruce. And revealing secrets from the battle sites of their most famous victories against their hated English overlords.

programme.desc: The contestants are helicoptered into dangerous alpine terrain, where they must climb to the top of a jagged cliff. Meanwhile, tempers flare between mother and daughter, and with little food, some contestants are running out of steam.

programme.title: Arabian Seas
programme.desc: The sea turtle is one of the oldest animals on earth. These ancient mariners even pre-date the dinosaurs. They have existed, relatively unchanged, for over 100 million years.

programme.title: Wild Birds of Australia
programme.desc: Follow the story of Harry and Sally, a pair of little penguins. These flightless, flippered birds create some of the noisiest neighborhoods in nature.

programme.title: Minibods
programme.desc: Get ready for some pumpkin munch mayhem! Newt has grown a giant pumpkin for Halloween, but a hungry Wrigglepillar keeps trying to eat it. In a football game, Bubbles cheats to help her team win. Jeff is excited for a dancing game, but Fuse wont listen to the instructions and ruins the fun.

programme.title: Morphle
programme.desc: A strange magic is bringing objects to life all over Petport, and Jordie is the first to notice when his bed sprouts legs and runs away! While chasing it, Mila and Morphle discover the problem is bigger than they thought, as they must also wrangle a magic carpet on a wild flight. Their adventure is a frantic chase to catch and calm the enchanted items causing chaos across the city.

programme.title: Morphle
programme.desc: Mila and Morphle are having a day focused on helping little ones, but their plans are thrown into chaos by one baby-sized problem after another! First, they have to spring into action to save a friends baby carriage when it starts rolling away. Soon after, they discover a group of adorable but naughty baby Morphles running wild through the city, forcing them to find a way to round them all up safely.

programme.title: Lellobee City Farm
programme.desc: Get ready for some singing fun at Lellobee City Farm! Learn your ABCs in the Boogie Barn and then learn how to wash your hands before eating some delicious dumplings. Help Ella play Mummy Duck and keep all the baby ducks together. When accidents happen, sing a boo boo song to feel better. End the day with a special Chinese lullaby from Grandma Mei at a sleepover.

programme.title: Lellobee City Farm
programme.desc: Its time to explore Earth and nature! A frog ballerina shows Ella that rain can be fun and is important for the farm. The friends celebrate Earth Day by litter picking and composting. When some of the animals get sick, Ella helps the vet at a makeshift animal hospital. Plus, watch a caterpillar turn into a butterfly and learn some yoga moves with Rishis mom.

programme.title: JJs Animal Time
programme.desc: Its time for giggles and fun! When JJs toy is broken, Boba cheers him up by pretending to be a tickly caterpillar. The friends find a disco mat and have a groovy dance-off. When JJ gets frustrated while skiing, Mochi is there to encourage him. A pirate swipes the bath toys and a buzzing fly interrupts breakfast. Plus, Wally plays firefighter and ends up being the one who needs rescuing!

programme.title: CoComelon
programme.desc: Get ready to learn with JJ! Embark on a musical journey that starts with the ABC Song, making it fun to learn every letter. Once youve mastered the alphabet, the adventure continues with a trip back in time to count from one to ten with a group of silly dinosaurs. Its a fun-filled lesson that makes learning feel like a game.

programme.title: CeCe Time
programme.desc: Enjoy playtime on the farm with CeCe! Join Cece for a day of fun where she connects with the farm animals in her own special way. She imagines herself as Little Bo Peep on an adventure to rescue her lost toy sheep. Later, Farmer Cece helps round up her classmates, who are all pretending to be different farm animals, just in time for a snack. Its a day of imagination and fun on the farm!

programme.title: Little Angel
programme.desc: Join Baby John as he learns all about growing up! The day starts with a fun song about cleaning up his toys. Then, its time to get ready for school and learn about classroom routines. The biggest adventure of all is learning how to be a good big brother and helping take care of his baby sister. Its a day full of important lessons, responsibility, and family fun.

programme.title: Little Angel
programme.desc: Pack a picnic, its time for a day out! Follow Baby John and his entire family on a special trip to the park. They play on the swings, have a delicious picnic lunch, and make wonderful new memories together. Its a heartwarming look at the joy of a family adventure.

programme.title: Blippi Wonders
programme.desc: The animal kingdom is a wonderful place! Join Blippi Wonders as he learns about creatures of all shapes and sizes. He discovers how a caterpillar turns into a butterfly, why a camel has a hump, and what makes a whale so big. From the jungle to the farm, its an animal adventure full of fun and fascinating facts.

programme.title: Blippi Wonders
programme.desc: The world is full of wonders, and Blippi is ready to explore them! In this adventure, Blippi Wonders travels to Ancient Egypt to learn about the pyramids, then dives deep into the human brain to see how it works. From history to biology, its a journey that celebrates the wonderful and diverse world we live in.

programme.title: Go Buster
programme.desc: Buster loves his Mommy and they always have so much fun together! They spend a special day painting and playing. When Buster smashes a flowerpot by accident, his mommy is there to help. For Mothers Day, Buster tries to make the day as special as possible and makes a messy, glittery card at school. Mommy is always there, whether its for watching fireworks or saving the day!

programme.title: Go Buster
programme.desc: Buster is always there to save the day! He rescues a puppy that gets stuck in a tree. When Bandit is making his friend Ash feel left out at his birthday party, Buster steps in. He goes on an adventure and helps a T-Rex find its lost egg. He even becomes Super Buster to find a lost hat and saves his friends when they get stuck in the mud at the construction site.

programme.title: JJs Animal Time
programme.desc: Its JJs Animal Time and theres so much to do! Join Wally as he directs a play version of Hey Diddle Diddle. Go on a treasure hunt to find the keys to unlock a mysterious chest. Help Little Red Riding JJ avoid Wally the Wolfs silly traps. Then, blast off in a rocketship to play tag with the stars. Its a day of fun, friendship and adventure with all of JJs animal pals!

programme.title: Dance Party
programme.desc: Are you ready to dance? A magical mirror creates colorful chaos and fluffy cloud sheep come down to play! Take a ride on a bus driven by a fun-loving monkey and try to keep a sneaky wolf away from your alphabet cupcakes. Go on a pirate adventure on the high seas, play peekaboo with safari animals and make funny faces on your breakfast pancakes.

programme.title: CoComelon
programme.desc: Its a beautiful day for an animal adventure! Join JJ as he visits a farm to sing Old MacDonald with all the animals. The fun continues as he learns about the sounds animals make and dances along with them. This musical story is a delightful journey into the wonderful world of our furry and feathered friends.

programme.title: Morphle
programme.desc: Theres a new morphing creature in town, and hes up to no good! Orphle, a naughty green lookalike of Morphle, leads his gang of bandits on a city-wide mischief spree. Its up to Mila and the real Morphle to become heroes, chasing down the troublemakers and using their own clever transformations to clean up the chaotic mess.

programme.title: Morphle
programme.desc: Mila and Morphle are hoping for a peaceful day of projects, starting with planting a vegetable garden. But when their magic seeds sprout into enormous, uncontrollable veggies, their plans get complicated! Their day is further interrupted when they must stop Orphle, who is recklessly driving a construction digger and threatening to ruin their garden and their entry for the town baking contest.

programme.title: Rob the Robot
programme.desc: Get ready for a funny mummy! Rob and his friends are reading about ancient Egypt and decide to visit the Pyramid Planet, where Rob plays a practical joke on his friends. Later, wishing they could all make a wish that would come true, the gang heads for the Wishing Planet, but they learn to be careful what they wish for.

programme.title: Rob the Robot
programme.desc: Lets have some fair play! The friends head to the Fair Planet to play on the big rides, but they soon discover that TK has a big fear of heights! Later, when Rob cant get a song out of his head, they take him to the Repair Planet, but things go wrong when he decides to fix more than he should.

programme.title: Little Baby Bum
programme.desc: Its time to sing along to all your favorites! Max has fun in his first bath and he and Mia play peek-a-boo with their mummy. Twinkle helps Max get to sleep with some colorful magic. The family makes hand shadow puppets and Daddy Panda turns boring veggies into fun faces. Plus, the friends learn all about shapes on a fun train ride.

programme.title: Little Baby Bum
programme.desc: Its time to learn about numbers, sounds and colors! The friends fly colorful fish kites at the park and bake some yummy cookies. They play with five little speckled frogs and five little green monster bottles. They learn about all the sounds that different vehicles make, how to say hello with a wave and what sounds different instruments make.

programme.title: ARPO
programme.desc: Join Arpo as he tries to keep the house in order, a task thats easier said than done with Baby Daniel around! Whether its tackling a mountain of dishes, dealing with a misbehaving vacuum, or chasing a mischievous squirrel, Arpos day is never dull. This is a story of household adventures and the funny side of chores.

programme.title: ARPO
programme.desc: Brace yourself for a series of wacky inventions and robotic mishaps! Arpo faces everything from a harmless kitchen timer he mistakes for a bomb to a drone that wont leave him alone. When a multiplying ray gets into the wrong hands, it creates more trouble than anyone can handle. These adventures are a fun look at how technology and curiosity can lead to the most unexpected and comical situations.

programme.title: Geckos Garage
programme.desc: Its a day of pure adventure for Gecko and his friends! The fun starts when a brand new bouncy castle arrives at the garage. Afterward, the weather turns chilly, and the trucks have a wonderful time playing in the snow. This story is all about finding fun and excitement in every situation.

programme.title: Geckos Garage
programme.desc: Get ready for a day of boo boos and rescues! The trouble starts when Max breaks his suspension during a basketball game. Then, Gecko gets his own boo boo while fixing a bus and needs Grandmas help to finish the job. The adventures continue with a treasure hunt where a winch breaks, a game of hide-and-seek where a Mechanical gets lost and even Grandma causes some trouble while sleepwalking.

programme.title: Little Angel
programme.desc: Its a yes yes day for fun! This energetic adventure follows Baby John and his friends as they have a blast at the playground. They learn to say yes to sharing their toys, yes to taking turns on the slide, and yes to being kind to one another. Its a joyful celebration of friendship and playing together.

programme.title: Little Angel
programme.desc: Jump into a world of music and fun with Baby John! Follow him through a day where every moment has a special song. He sings about his loving family, explores the sounds that animals make on the farm, and celebrates all the things that make his life a happy and song-filled adventure.

programme.title: Minibods
programme.desc: Its no fun being a spoilsport! Fuse finds a spider in his gym and is too scared to get it out. Jeff and Bubbles are having trouble playing with their building blocks together. Bubbles spoils Pogos magic show by exposing all his secrets and Lulu struggles to make a music video when her star Oddbird keeps marching away.

programme.title: Minibods
programme.desc: Get ready to build a Snowbod! Pogo wants to show Lulu how fun snow can be, so they build a snowman together, but the sun comes out and starts to melt it! Lulu reads a story about a magical Snowhoof and sets off to find it in real life. On the ice, Fuse gets impatient when Jeff cant learn how to skate as quickly as the others.

programme.title: CoComelon
programme.desc: Its time for some fun with friends! In this playful story, JJ and his best pals learn how to share their toys and work together as a team. From the playground to the classroom, they discover that every activity is more fun when you do it with friends. Its a musical celebration of teamwork and friendship.

programme.title: Cody Time
programme.desc: Singing is always fun with Cody and his friends! He uses his imagination to play with a simple cardboard box and solves a mystery of ten missing buses. When Cody gets upset, he learns to handle his emotions in a healthy way. He has a playdate with Nina where they learn the value of sharing, helps his dad cook delicious vegetables and discovers that even when plans dont work out, friends can make any day a special day.

programme.title: CeCe Time
programme.desc: Enjoy playtime on the farm with CeCe! Join Cece for a day of fun where she connects with the farm animals in her own special way. She imagines herself as Little Bo Peep on an adventure to rescue her lost toy sheep. Later, Farmer Cece helps round up her classmates, who are all pretending to be different farm animals, just in time for a snack. Its a day of imagination and fun on the farm!

programme.title: Lellobee City Farm
programme.desc: Get ready for some singing fun at Lellobee City Farm! Learn your ABCs in the Boogie Barn and then learn how to wash your hands before eating some delicious dumplings. Help Ella play Mummy Duck and keep all the baby ducks together. When accidents happen, sing a boo boo song to feel better. End the day with a special Chinese lullaby from Grandma Mei at a sleepover.

programme.title: Lellobee City Farm
programme.desc: Welcome to the learning city farm! Help Ella count all the buses as they drive by. Join Grandma Mei for a fun and active dance session. Make a healthy salad while dancing the salsa and learn how to recycle to save the planet. Plus, learn a silly song to cheer up a friend and celebrate everything that grows with the Growing Song.

programme.title: Playtime With Twinkle
programme.desc: Twinkle loves playtime and so do her friends! They bounce high on a trampoline and learn about safety. They play with musical instruments and find a surprise music box in the forest. They discover an umbrella and learn how to use it to stay dry in the rain. They also have fun with wobbly Jello, squeaky shoes and making funny faces in the mirror.

programme.title: Playtime With Twinkle
programme.desc: Lets learn about colors and shapes! Twinkle has fun painting a picture with lots of different colors. She and her friends learn all about the colors of the rainbow, first with some baby birds, then on a rainbow slide and finally with a rainbow bubble bath. They build a tower with rainbow stones and learn all about the different shapes of the clouds.

programme.title: Rob the Robot
programme.desc: After days of rain in space, the crew decides they need to chill out and travel to the Weather Planet to find some sunshine. Their next adventure begins when they find a treasure map and head to Buccaneer Planet, only to discover they arent the only ones searching for pirate gold.

programme.title: Rob the Robot
programme.desc: Its time to be music makers! When TK breaks her guitar, the friends head off to the Repair Shop Planet, where they discover you dont need fancy instruments to make music, just a little imagination! Later, when the gangs favorite video game breaks, the crew heads to Arcade Planet, where Rob learns theres a lot more to having fun than playing by yourself.

programme.title: The Sharksons
programme.desc: Get ready to sing along with the Sharksons! When Baby Grub gets a boo-boo, Mummy Shark is there to make it all better. The friends bake a delicious cake for Old McDugong. All mummys are superheroes and the friends sing a song to say thank you. Plus, they play pass the parcel at a party, build an underwater ball pit and learn that teamwork makes the dream work.

programme.title: The Sharksons
programme.desc: Get ready for some underwater learning! Help Baby Grub guide five little fishes back home while learning to count. The sea friends swim through the alphabet and you can learn your ABC phonics with examples from their underwater world. Count the bubbles the whale blows out and then get ready for school with the Sharksons. Plus, learn the importance of brushing your teeth!

programme.title: Oddbods: Short
programme.desc: Welcome to the wonderfully weird world of the Oddbods! This collection of bite-size adventures follows seven colorful friends with very big, and very different, personalities. Whether its Fuses hot-headedness, Pogos pranks, or Zees laziness, their unique traits clash in spectacular fashion. Watch as simple, everyday situations spiral into unpredictable and hilarious mayhem, proving that with the Oddbods, life is never, ever dull.

programme.title: Oddbods: Short
programme.desc: Welcome to the wonderfully weird world of the Oddbods! This collection of bite-size adventures follows seven colorful friends with very big, and very different, personalities. Whether its Fuses hot-headedness, Pogos pranks, or Zees laziness, their unique traits clash in spectacular fashion. Watch as simple, everyday situations spiral into unpredictable and hilarious mayhem, proving that with the Oddbods, life is never, ever dull.

programme.title: CeCe Time
programme.desc: Enjoy playtime on the farm with CeCe! Join Cece for a day of fun where she connects with the farm animals in her own special way. She imagines herself as Little Bo Peep on an adventure to rescue her lost toy sheep. Later, Farmer Cece helps round up her classmates, who are all pretending to be different farm animals, just in time for a snack. Its a day of imagination and fun on the farm!

programme.title: CoComelon
programme.desc: On your marks, get set, go! Its a day of fun and friendly competition. Join JJ and his friends as they head outside for a sports day. Theyll splash in the pool, kick a soccer ball on the field, and learn that the most important part of any game is having fun and trying your best.

programme.title: CoComelon
programme.desc: Lets sing along and dance with JJ! The family rushes to get the recycling out before the truck comes. Cody loses his balloon at the train park but gets it back with the help of the park train. Nina gets a silly check-up at the doctors office and the class learns all about airplanes. The kids help wash a fire truck and Miss Appleberry teaches the class how to sign their ABCs.

programme.title: Minibods
programme.desc: Get ready to use your pedal power! Newt and her friends ride their bikes on an adventure to find a real-life Flutterbug. Pogo wants to pick a yummy Mang-Mang fruit, but he has to learn to be patient and wait for it to ripen. Jeff gets a cute but messy houseguest and Fuse has to be brave when he hears spooky noises in the night.

programme.title: Minibods
programme.desc: Get ready for a teddy bear panic! Pogo accidentally ruins Newts special teddy bear-shaped hedge and isnt sure if he should tell the truth. Jeff has to overcome his fear of mud to get his favorite feather duster back. Bubbles wants to take a picture with a big purple star and builds a rocket to get to it. Pogo tries to surprise his friends with ice cream, but it keeps melting.

programme.title: Morphle
programme.desc: An unusual wave of mayhem is sweeping through Petport, and the resulting chaos is making all the babies incredibly cranky! Its up to Mila and Morphle to fix the problems and restore peace. Their mission begins when they confront a giant pizza monster terrorizing the streets. Just as they solve that, a giant robot starts rampaging through the city, adding to the cranky-inducing chaos they must stop.

programme.title: Morphle
programme.desc: The ultimate game of tag is on! Morphle and his mischievous green counterpart, Orphle, are chasing each other all over the city. Their playful rivalry escalates as they morph into anything they can imagine-a speedy race car, a soaring jet, a stomping T-Rex-to tag each other. Its a thrilling, fast-paced chase from start to finish.

programme.title: Lellobee City Farm
programme.desc: Welcome to the learning city farm! Help Ella count all the buses as they drive by. Join Grandma Mei for a fun and active dance session. Make a healthy salad while dancing the salsa and learn how to recycle to save the planet. Plus, learn a silly song to cheer up a friend and celebrate everything that grows with the Growing Song.

programme.title: Lellobee City Farm
programme.desc: Get ready for a farming sing-along! When Ella is feeling anxious, she does the five senses shakedown to feel better. She and Rishi play a game of I Hear With My Little Ear to find all the animals on the farm. Do the ABC dance, go stargazing with Grandma Mei and take care of five mischievous monkeys. Plus, learn that its okay to make mistakes and that tidying up can be fun.

programme.title: CoComelon
programme.desc: Sing along with JJ and his friends! Work together to build a giant pillow fort and then go on a fun family vacation in a camper van. Do amazing science experiments with TomTom and YoYo and learn how to make the perfect peanut butter and jelly sandwich. Take a trip to the train park with your grandparents and learn how to take good care of Bingo the dog.

programme.title: Nina Time
programme.desc: Get ready for a Pet Store Woof! Nina and her dad take a trip to the pet store, where her dog, Patas, uses his woofs to tell them everything he needs. Nina sings the Finger Family song as she helps her family members find their missing things. She challenges her friends to a soccer game and has a special secret on Nochebuena. Plus, she goes on an adventure with her stuffed bunny and builds a new paper doll friend with her Abuelita.

programme.title: Dance Party
programme.desc: Are you ready to dance? A magical mirror creates colorful chaos and fluffy cloud sheep come down to play! Take a ride on a bus driven by a fun-loving monkey and try to keep a sneaky wolf away from your alphabet cupcakes. Go on a pirate adventure on the high seas, play peekaboo with safari animals and make funny faces on your breakfast pancakes.

programme.title: Little Angel
programme.desc: Our planet is a beautiful place! In this special musical, Baby John takes a walk through nature to appreciate the trees, the animals, and the world around him. He learns about the importance of keeping our planet clean and healthy so everyone can enjoy its wonders, a lovely tribute to our amazing Earth.

programme.title: Little Angel
programme.desc: Lets do what the animals do! The kids get their faces painted and pretend to be their favorite animals. At the zoo, they learn about which animals are loud and which are quiet. The class learns about animals from all around the world and performs a Baby Shark play. Plus, Jill finds a lost lamb and the family gets chased by a smelly skunk!

programme.title: Blippi Wonders
programme.desc: The world is so much fun to explore! Join Blippi on his adventures as he discovers how rainbows get their colors and what its like on the moon while learning about gravity. Hell dive deep into the ocean with a jellyfish, find out how honey is made from a busy bee, see how snowflakes are formed and get a tour of a real chocolate factory. Its an exciting journey full of amazing discoveries!

programme.title: Blippi Wonders
programme.desc: Get ready for some thrilling adventures with Blippi Wonders! This journey is packed with excitement and learning. Discover how a firetruck and a police car work, learn about the sticky science of glue, and see the amazing power of magnets. Its a fun-filled exploration of the amazing things that make our world work.

programme.title: Go Buster
programme.desc: Everyday is fun with Buster and his friends! A new kid, Ash the firetruck, joins the school and Buster makes him feel welcome. He learns to share his remote-control car with Scout and that its not all about winning when playing games. He has a sleepover with Bandit, helps his mommy make a Mothers Day card and even tries to cook dinner with Grandpa. Its always a new adventure!

programme.title: Go Buster
programme.desc: Buster and Bandit become the giant ice cream thieves when they sneak into a carwash that has been turned into an ice cream machine! The adventures continue as Buster gets locked in jail and has to be rescued and the friends form a band at the construction site. They also have to work up the courage to ride the new super-speedyway and help a lost cowboy hat find its way home.

programme.title: Dance Party
programme.desc: Youre invited to a dance and play party! Go on a make-believe adventure to outer space or the bottom of the sea. Find your Happy Place, and then do the Coco Dance and the Looby Loo. Sing about friendship, play a game of Red Light, Green Light, and have a Copy Me style dance-off on the playground. Its party time!

programme.title: Cody Time
programme.desc: Its a time of fun and play as Codys family grows! Cody learns hes going to be a big brother and spends a special day with his mama and her baby bump. He has mixed feelings about the new baby but learns to be a caring older sibling, even helping put his sister Kendi to sleep. The fun continues as Cody celebrates his own special day with a dinosaur-themed birthday party.

programme.title: CeCe Time
programme.desc: Enjoy playtime on the farm with CeCe! Join Cece for a day of fun where she connects with the farm animals in her own special way. She imagines herself as Little Bo Peep on an adventure to rescue her lost toy sheep. Later, Farmer Cece helps round up her classmates, who are all pretending to be different farm animals, just in time for a snack. Its a day of imagination and fun on the farm!

programme.title: Morphle
programme.desc: From stopping bullies to fixing broken toys, theres no problem too big or small for Morphle! In this magical adventure, Milas pet morphs into all sorts of incredible things-a giant construction vehicle, a speeding race car, a mighty T-Rex-to help people and protect the city. Its a showcase of Morphles most amazing and heroic transformations.

programme.title: Morphle
programme.desc: Its a day of city-wide chaos as Mila and Morphle are on a mission to find the Mayors lost dog, Barky! With Morphle morphed into a super search-dog, they follow the trail. But their heroic search is interrupted when they must also deal with the naughty Fruit Bandits, who are causing mayhem across town. Its a hectic adventure of tracking clues and stopping troublemakers to restore peace and bring Barky home.

programme.title: Rob the Robot
programme.desc: Orbit has a small problem when he cant see the tiny objects on display at the Miniature Museum on the Miniature Planet. After their museum trip, the friends head to the Puzzle Planet where their puzzle-solving abilities are put to the test while they try to find their lost pal, Squeak.

programme.title: Rob the Robot
programme.desc: Theres a new sheriff in town! What could be more fun than going to the Old West Planet to play REAL cowboys? Unfortunately, Ema gets a little carried away in her new role as sheriff. After their western adventure, the crew heads to the Beach Planet and encounters a hermit crab that has lost its shell!

programme.title: Little Baby Bum
programme.desc: Get ready for a day of vehicles and animals! Mia makes Max his very own fire engine out of a cardboard box. The family takes a fun ride on the big red bus. Mummy makes mealtime more fun by pretending to be different animals. The family has a picnic and helps some ants collect crumbs and Mia and Max enjoy a bike ride with their friend Tootson the Train.

programme.title: Little Baby Bum
programme.desc: Get ready to sing your heart out with Mia! She and her friend Bari pretend to be bakers and make yummy cupcakes. She and her dad take a splashy ride in her car on a rainy day. She and her friend Maple learn about big and small while playing in the garden. She also learns about avocados, kangaroos and how to make her own instruments.

programme.title: ARPO
programme.desc: Prepare for pandemonium! Arpo and Daniels attempt at gardening takes a dangerous turn when their plant grows into a monstrous creature that tries to eat everyone. As if thats not enough, the new smart house system goes haywire, and the furniture starts a rebellion. Its up to Arpo to fix the pandemonium in this action-packed adventure.

programme.title: ARPO
programme.desc: When Baby Daniel is around, chaos is sure to follow! Join Arpo as he navigates a series of baby-made messes. Whether Daniel is turning the bathroom into a bubble-filled wonderland, making a sticky disaster while baking cookies, or causing a ruckus with a runaway vacuum cleaner, Arpo is always there to save the day. Its a hilarious look at the messes and mischief that come with taking care of a very curious baby.

programme.title: Geckos Garage
programme.desc: Baby Truck is always ready for an adventure, and today hes leading his friends on an exciting exploration! Their playtime takes a messy turn when Baby Trucks curiosity gets the better of him, and he ends up stuck deep in the mud. It looks like hes in real trouble, but his friends wont leave him behind. This is a wonderful tale of how the smallest heroes, working together as a team, can solve even the stickiest of problems.

programme.title: Geckos Garage
programme.desc: Join Gecko and the team for a fun day out! They go camping and when it rains, they build a water wheel to generate green energy. At the beach, they play hide-and-seek and Eric and Dylan have a sandcastle building competition. The team helps Weasel when he gets sick, has a balloon race for Miles birthday and helps Trevor fix his farm on Earth Day.

programme.title: Little Angel
programme.desc: Getting ready for the day is an adventure in itself! In this musical journey, Baby John learns all about healthy routines. He sings a fun song while brushing his teeth, learns how to wash his hands all by himself, and discovers that getting dressed is a fun puzzle. He shows how simple songs can make everyday tasks exciting.

programme.title: Little Angel
programme.desc: Get ready for some fun in the mud! Jill tries to keep Baby John and Bingo from playing in the mud, but she ends up joining in on the fun. The boys have a healthy competition at a fruit-themed play park. Baby John has a fun playdate with his grandpa and his vintage motorbike. Mom helps Baby John get ready for school and the family helps him learn that its okay to ask for help.

programme.title: Minibods
programme.desc: Who will be the winner? Newt really wants to win a gold star at the gym, but she keeps losing. Lulu is so excited for the funfair that she keeps jumping the line and upsetting her friends. Bubbles accidentally scrapes the paint on Jeffs ceiling and tries to fix it herself. At bedtime, Pogo wants to play, but everyone else is ready to sleep.

programme.title: Minibods
programme.desc: Get ready to build a Snowbod! Pogo wants to show Lulu how fun snow can be, so they build a snowman together, but the sun comes out and starts to melt it! Lulu reads a story about a magical Snowhoof and sets off to find it in real life. On the ice, Fuse gets impatient when Jeff cant learn how to skate as quickly as the others.

programme.title: CoComelon
programme.desc: Its time for some fun with friends! In this playful story, JJ and his best pals learn how to share their toys and work together as a team. From the playground to the classroom, they discover that every activity is more fun when you do it with friends. Its a musical celebration of teamwork and friendship.

programme.title: CoComelon
programme.desc: Get ready for a day of fun and games with JJ! The excitement begins with a game of Peek-A-Boo, full of giggles and surprises. Afterward, its time to head to the kitchen for a musical Pat-a-Cake session. This is a story about the simple joys of playing, laughing, and making wonderful memories together.

programme.title: CoComelon
programme.desc: Its a beautiful day for an animal adventure! Join JJ as he visits a farm to sing Old MacDonald with all the animals. The fun continues as he learns about the sounds animals make and dances along with them. This musical story is a delightful journey into the wonderful world of our furry and feathered friends.

programme.title: Lellobee City Farm
programme.desc: Its time to explore Earth and nature! A frog ballerina shows Ella that rain can be fun and is important for the farm. The friends celebrate Earth Day by litter picking and composting. When some of the animals get sick, Ella helps the vet at a makeshift animal hospital. Plus, watch a caterpillar turn into a butterfly and learn some yoga moves with Rishis mom.

programme.title: Lellobee City Farm
programme.desc: Get ready for a farming sing-along! When Ella is feeling anxious, she does the five senses shakedown to feel better. She and Rishi play a game of I Hear With My Little Ear to find all the animals on the farm. Do the ABC dance, go stargazing with Grandma Mei and take care of five mischievous monkeys. Plus, learn that its okay to make mistakes and that tidying up can be fun.

programme.title: Playtime With Twinkle
programme.desc: Lets learn about colors and shapes! Twinkle has fun painting a picture with lots of different colors. She and her friends learn all about the colors of the rainbow, first with some baby birds, then on a rainbow slide and finally with a rainbow bubble bath. They build a tower with rainbow stones and learn all about the different shapes of the clouds.

programme.title: Playtime With Twinkle
programme.desc: Get ready for some fun and learning with Twinkle! She builds a sandcastle and learns about different shapes. She plants some seeds and watches them grow into beautiful flowers. She finds some colorful balloons and learns to count. She also learns about animal sounds, different kinds of fruit and how to make music. Plus, the friends build a snowman and play a fun game of peek-a-boo.

programme.title: Rob the Robot
programme.desc: The friends are puzzled when theyre missing the last piece of their jigsaw and must travel to the Puzzle Planet to find a replacement. Next, Rob builds a surprise mouse house for Squeak, but when the others suggest improvements, they all head to the Craft Planet to see who can build the best one.

programme.title: Rob the Robot
programme.desc: Get ready for some hocus pocus! The crew heads to Wizard Planet, where they discover that learning magic requires much more than a wand and pointy hat. After their magical adventure, the gang is having some snow time fun on the Winter Planet when they discover a lonely goose and wonder why it hasnt migrated.

programme.title: The Sharksons
programme.desc: Get ready for some underwater fun! Take a ride on the yellow submarine bus with all your Splashy Reef friends. Sing a lullaby with a sleepy shark and then celebrate how cool it is to be a shark. Help Tucker the Turtle take his bath and join a curious crab on a quest to find the perfect shell. Plus, meet the Shark family as they work to keep the sea clean.

programme.title: The Sharksons
programme.desc: Get ready for some underwater learning! Help Baby Grub guide five little fishes back home while learning to count. The sea friends swim through the alphabet and you can learn your ABC phonics with examples from their underwater world. Count the bubbles the whale blows out and then get ready for school with the Sharksons. Plus, learn the importance of brushing your teeth!

programme.title: Oddbods: Short
programme.desc: Welcome to the wonderfully weird world of the Oddbods! This collection of bite-size adventures follows seven colorful friends with very big, and very different, personalities. Whether its Fuses hot-headedness, Pogos pranks, or Zees laziness, their unique traits clash in spectacular fashion. Watch as simple, everyday situations spiral into unpredictable and hilarious mayhem, proving that with the Oddbods, life is never, ever dull.

programme.title: Oddbods: Short
programme.desc: Welcome to the wonderfully weird world of the Oddbods! This collection of bite-size adventures follows seven colorful friends with very big, and very different, personalities. Whether its Fuses hot-headedness, Pogos pranks, or Zees laziness, their unique traits clash in spectacular fashion. Watch as simple, everyday situations spiral into unpredictable and hilarious mayhem, proving that with the Oddbods, life is never, ever dull.

programme.title: JJs Animal Time
programme.desc: Its time for giggles and fun! When JJs toy is broken, Boba cheers him up by pretending to be a tickly caterpillar. The friends find a disco mat and have a groovy dance-off. When JJ gets frustrated while skiing, Mochi is there to encourage him. A pirate swipes the bath toys and a buzzing fly interrupts breakfast. Plus, Wally plays firefighter and ends up being the one who needs rescuing!

programme.title: Cody Time
programme.desc: Sing along with Cody through all of lifes moments! He moves to a new house and when he feels nervous, his family helps him get excited. When Cody gets sick, his mom takes care of him. After a bad dream, his parents show him all the things that make him feel safe. He learns that goodbye isnt forever and gets inspired by his fathers story about Anansi the spider to help others.

programme.title: CoComelon
programme.desc: The school bell is ringing for the very first time for JJ! Join him on the exciting journey of his first day of school. Hell learn how to ride the bus, meet his friendly teacher, and make a whole new group of friends. This story shows that school is a wonderful place for learning, playing, and making new memories.

programme.title: Little Angel
programme.desc: Its time to come and sing with Little Angel! Join Baby John as he learns a valuable lesson about taking turns while playing with his family. The musical fun continues at the playground, where he sings about playing on the swings and slide. The day ends with a heartwarming song about the joy of sharing toys and playing together, making it a fun-filled day of music and learning.

programme.title: Little Angel
programme.desc: Everyone can be a little helper! The kids pretend to be construction workers and learn all about safety. They learn about all the important jobs in their community, from police officers to doctors. Dad is a great helper when he works on the car and the whole family pitches in to clean up around the house. Plus, the kids learn about saving money in their piggy bank.

programme.title: Fam I Love You
programme.desc: Qalisha,Nenek, Iman danMarrisasepakatuntukmembantuShahirdenganmelakukan"part time".

programme.desc: Kemunculan Miss A di internet yang cuba menjatuhkan reputasi Mal membuatkan dia paranoid. Dia cuba siasat semua pelajar dengan nama bermula huruf A, termasuklah Arif dan Adam.

programme.title: FYP: Famili Yang Popular
programme.desc: Zahrin diberhentikan kerja oleh bosnya. Maimun pula masih berusaha untuk jadi influencer dan cuba buat bisnes online tetapi gagal kerana tidak berbakat. Bonda terkejut Zahrin menghidap sakit kanser.

programme.title: Fam I Love You
programme.desc: Qalisha,Nenek, Iman danMarrisasepakatuntukmembantuShahirdenganmelakukan"part time".

programme.title: Family Spy
programme.desc: Ep06 Roz dan Rin diserang. Dia menjejak para penyerangnya ke pangkalan rahsia mereka. Ejen Mah dihantar untuk menyiasat tetapi dia ditangkap. Roz, Datin Seri dan Rin bekerjasama membebaskan Ejen Mah dan Roz dapat mengalahkan Nora, ketua penculik. Tetapi Dr Kaos Jr telah maju selangkah dan bereksperimen dengan senjata barunya.

programme.title: SMK
programme.desc: Cikgu Mus , guru kaunseling dijemput ke sekolah. Cikgu Mus adalah kawan sekolah Cikgu Aini yang mempunyai sejarahnya tersendiri. Mal terjumpa pita VHS milik Cikgu Mus yang menyimpan rahsia Cikgu Aini.

programme.title: SMK
programme.desc: Pita VHS itu adalah rakaman video Cikgu Mus dan Cikgu Aini Ketika mereka jadi pelajar pada tahun 1998. Kedua-duanya amat akrab dan sering membuat kerenah di sekolah, sehinggalah kemunculan Assuntha Devi.

programme.title: Band of Sisters
programme.desc: Dal Hee deletes the accident footage from the witnesss USB drive.Gi Chan accuses Pil Mo of running a dishonourable business with harmful products.

programme.title: Zoo Vet At Large
programme.desc: Dr. Matt helps to save a badger knocked down by car but will it return to the wild? He relieves a cat with a particular problem and helps a farmer catch a runaway calf. Up at the Zoo he knocks out a polar bear and puts a Zebra back on her feet.

programme.title: My House And Other Animals
programme.desc: Meet the modern-day Dr Doolittles with a passion for all creatures great and small: the unsung heroes of the wildlife world, whose homes have become havens for every animal imaginable.

programme.title: Cute Pets At Home
programme.desc: Brother Hui, who runs an amphibian and reptile store in Xinxing District, Kaohsiung City, has a wide range of knowledge in the field of reptiles. He started with red-eared sliders and gradually got in touch with tortoises, lizards, snakes and other reptile pets. In Brother Huis brick-and-mortar store, the most special existence is the two store pets, the South American lizards. The male is called Meatball and the female is called Porkball. How did their fate with Brother Hui begin? Brother Hui, who has many years of experience in raising South American lizards, also generously share his breeding secrets. How to distinguish male and female South American lizards? How to keep them healthy? Whats the secret to taming them? In this epsiode, we unpack the living environment of South American lizards and reveal the breeding guide!

programme.title: ...Make You Laugh Out Loud
programme.desc: From Christmas as youve never experienced it before, with out-of-tune carol singers, Santa getting stuck, ungrateful children and exploding Christmas puddings - to OAPs, kids and even blundering burglars, six brand spanking new topics are given the trademark LOL treatment, combining user-generated footage with comic narration by comedian Iain Lee. Theres a treat too for animal lovers with a Puppies special featuring some of the cutest, as well as funniest, puppy clips on the web.

programme.title: The Dog Rescuers
programme.desc: In a very special festive edition of The Dog Rescuers, Inspector Lyndsey Taylor is called to a case of a desperate dog, left home alone at Christmas. With concern growing for the dogs health, can Lyndsey secure a warrant for police to enter the property in time?

programme.title: Best Of Pets
programme.desc: Another episode of Best of Pets with funny pet clips.

programme.title: Cute Pet Guide
programme.desc: The era of high housing prices shocks the masses. However, some are willing to live in the mountains for their beloved parrots, just to give them the best breeding environment. Parrots have a long lifespan and their IQ is comparable to that of a five-year-old child. How do you make them behave? Training is actually a good way, but how? "Melon seeds" are key to the goal. If you want to raise a parrot, there are in fact many restrictions on choosing the right one. How should I put it? Dont miss "Cute Pet Guide"!

programme.title: Zoo Vet At Large
programme.desc: This week finds Dr. Matt grappling with wild cats, a juvenile delinquent donkey, too many male lemurs and a penguin with a eye problem.

programme.title: ...Make You Laugh Out Loud
programme.desc: From the funniest feline fails, to the cutest of kittens weve dug out the very best the internet has to offer, and weve the cream of the crop right here.

programme.title: Cute Pets At Home
programme.desc: Genus Pterophyllum, commonly known as P. scalare, freshwater angelfish or just angelfish is a large tropical fish native to the Amazon River in South America.They have a laterally flattened body, making them suitableto live in the crevices of tree roots in rivers with smooth water flow, and feeds on aquatic insects. The water temperature should be maintained at 26, and should reach 27-28 when breeding. The fertilized eggs are then released and attached to water plants or rocks, and the couple will take care of them together. However, once the eggs are hatched, the bigger ones will eat the smaller ones, hence not suitable to be raised together with other small fishes.

programme.title: The Dog Rescuers
programme.desc: Alan Davies returns for a brand-new series of The Dog Rescuers and its going to be bigger and better than ever. On this weeks show, German Shepherd puppies covered in their own mess and eating raw meat off a filthy floor. They need Inspector Herchy Boals help to get them out of their concrete cage.

programme.title: My House And Other Animals
programme.desc: Meet the modern-day Dr Doolittles with a passion for all creatures great and small: the unsung heroes of the wildlife world, whose homes have become havens for every animal imaginable.

programme.title: Best Of Pets
programme.desc: Another episode of Best of Pets with funny pet clips.

programme.title: Cute Pet Guide
programme.desc: The meerkat king from "Madagascar" is funny, but meerkats in real life are well-behaved, cuddly and they heal our hearts! Pocket sized pets are currently all the rage, but there are details you need to pay attention to when raising them. For example, hedgehogs are highly defensive, timid sugar gliders will harm themselves without being next to their owners, and cute guinea pigs like Norman from the movie "The Secret Life of Pets" are easily abandoned due to being easy to obtain and raise, etc. Dont worry, experts will teach you how to raise them! Come to a restaurant in Kaohsiung to get up close with Rocket Raccoon from "The Avengers"!

programme.desc: Weve scoured the internet clean to bring you the most entertaining puppy clips out there: overexcited pups, pilfering pups, pups who fall asleep in their dinner bowls, puppy vloggers, driving pups, and even a look at the latest craze: pups who go into a quivering frenzy at the sight of-K doorstoppers.

programme.title: The Dog Rescuers
programme.desc: Baxter is a Shih-Tzu that was discovered abandoned in an empty house on the outskirts of Manchester; thin and with extremely matted fur. Inspector Lyndsey Taylor comes to the rescue, but until all that fur is removed, nobody knows what lies beneath.

programme.title: Best Of Pets
programme.desc: Another episode of Best of Pets with funny pet clips.

programme.title: Cute Pet Guide
programme.desc: The charm of cute rabbits is irresistible! An old man raised hundreds of rabbits?! Playful little rabbits are spoiled yet timid! What should beginners pay attention to when raising rabbits?! Shocking! Rabbits can be poisoned by eating carrots?! Rabbits have a very bad temper?! They kick people they dont like?! Crazy about rabbits! Caregivers takes care of the little rabbits "wholeheartedly"?!

programme.title: Zoo Vet At Large
programme.desc: Dr. Matt tries to perk up Spike the iguana whos down in the dumps and he meets the latest fascinating additions to the aquarium the magical but very endangered seahorses. But he also faces every vets nightmare during an operation on a budgie.

programme.title: Scruffts
programme.desc: Six dogs, six handlers, all competing in the worlds largest and most famous dog show: "Crufts".nnBut they are not the pedigree pooches who compete to be labelled "Best in Show". These are the loveable family pets competing to win the "Scruffts" title.

programme.title: Have A Pet Day
programme.desc: Renowned Golden Bell awarded host Sandy Wu takes her beloved dog Hershey on outings, inviting celebrities and their adorable pets to join in the fun. Beyond exploring nature, the show delves into heartfelt conversations about the journey of pet ownership and shares touching stories amid delightful scenery and cuisine. The program features various enjoyable activities where owners and pets can bond, creating unforgettable memories through laughter and tears.

programme.title: A-League Men 25/26 Highlights
programme.desc: Top flight mens soccer returns in the ISUZU UTE A-League Men. Catch every moment on SPOTV as 12 teams compete in the regular season with top 4 advancing to a single-game knockout.

programme.title: Origins to Originals
programme.desc: From roast chicken to smash burgers to hot sauce, Stephanie Izard meets three different chefs putting their own California-inspired spin on food from their heritage by remixing traditional recipes that center local, fresh ingredients.

programme.title: Family Style
programme.desc: From brothers selling moms Syrian food to a Filipino family remixing a classic dessert to a mom and son running an Indian restaurant out of their house, Stephanie meets multi-gen families turning family recipes into smash hit food business.

programme.title: Pierogies, Bagels, and Ramen in NYC
programme.desc: Frankie Celenza takes a LOT of bites out of the big apple as he samples warm pillowy bagels And schmear, grabs pierogies at an old school Ukrainian spot, gets the scoop on innovative ice cream flavors, and slurps up some real ramen.

programme.title: Tacos, Brats, And Biscuits in Austin
programme.desc: Frankie Celenza goes down south to try Austins best bets - breakfast tacos are on the itinerary, as well as a bangin beer garden And sausage house, loaded biscuits, and dessert pancakes to boot! Austin may be weird but the food is fabulous.

programme.title: Smash Burgers And A Slice in Los Angeles
programme.desc: Frankie Celenza heads to all the buzzworthy spots in LA - cooking up calamari steak at a classic Mexican joint, tasting taro root donuts with fun flavors, grabbing a guanciale slice, and hopping on the line to make cheesy scrumptious smash burgers.

programme.title: Brooklyns Best Pizza Tour
programme.desc: Frankie Celenza goes on the best pizza party crawl that Brooklyn has to offer. Hell try a Neo-Neapolitan pie, a classic coal oven favorite, hell hit up a modern joint with innovative toppings, and a cozy Italian-owned neighborhood spot.

programme.title: BBQ Bowls And Puffy Tacos in San Antonio
programme.desc: Frankie Celenza gets his spurs on to sample San Antonios best all-day brunch, taste some epic puffy tacos at a classic car joint, create colorful conchitas, and bask in the beauty of BBQ Thai curry bowls.

programme.title: Loaded Dogs And Classic Cocktails in San Diego
programme.desc: Frankie Celenza heads to San Diego to sample a modern spin on classic deli fare, heavily loaded low-riding hot dogs, frosty And fruity Taiwanese snow ice, and fancy French cocktails from a rotating carousel bar.

programme.title: Lunches for Work
programme.desc: A big way to save money is to prepare homemade lunches for work. Frankie shows us how to make five delicious lunches for the whole work week. Youll be saving money, and you might even be more productive at work after a nutritious homemade lunch!

programme.title: The Weekly Struggle Budget
programme.desc: Frankie figured out the weekly budget grocery equation so you dont have to. Breakfast, lunch, and dinner for seven days, for a family of four, for under $150. All it takes is a little planning, meal prep, and using up leftovers in inventive ways.

programme.title: An Eggplant Extravaganza
programme.desc: Eggplant: A fruit you didnt know was a fruit. Often underrated and overlooked, Frankie shows us how to shop for and cook this filling, delicious, cost-effective, and versatile ingredient. The days of mushy, bitter eggplant will be long gone.

programme.title: Wrap it Up!
programme.desc: First, Frankie packs a one-two punch of bargain and nutrition with butternut squash in three nostalgic, old school dishes. Then he shows you how to prep portable wraps at home for easy, peasey lunches.

programme.title: Cauliflowers Star Power
programme.desc: Cauliflower is a star and can be transformed into unexpected dishes. Plus its delicious and nutritious! Frankie reminds us to buy dried-goods in bulk and makes a big chuck roast that stretches over three dishes.

programme.title: Food Back from the Dead
programme.desc: Stale bread, old bananas, canned food, dry foods... theyve all gotten a bad wrap, but this is not the end of them yet! Dont let this stuff sit in the pantry, dont let it go to waste - Frankie encourages you to stretch further and cheaper!

programme.title: Party for Pennies
programme.desc: Frankie makes three dishes for a party of four, that when combined, are cheaper than just one meal out for brunch. Then, its a taco party for five people for only $20!

programme.title: Instant Gratification
programme.desc: Everyone loves carbs! Endlessly versatile, cheap, and super filling - Frankie shows you tricks for pasta, pizza dough, and delicious, easy ramen meals that arent soup.

programme.title: We Knead Pizza
programme.desc: Cancel the pizza delivery, its time to save money and build your pies from scratch. With three different pizza styles, youre bound to find one that satisfies your craving without digging into your wallet.

programme.title: Oktoberfest
programme.desc: Join Frankie as he shares his budget friendly takes on Oktoberfest-inspired dishes, perfect for celebrating the fall season with friends. These festive and hearty meals will keep you cozy and full, and best of all, pair nicely with a beer.

programme.title: Frankies Italian Faves
programme.desc: Everyone knows Frankie cant live without pasta, but this week he shares his favorite Italian recipes that dont require any kneading. Add these simple, delicious dishes to your weeknight menu to complete your Italian dish repertoire.

programme.title: Whole Chicken 101
programme.desc: Join Frankie to learn the ins and outs of using every part of a chicken, as he demonstrates how to maximize the value and minimize waste. By cooking smarter, youll have three delectable recipes to last you the whole week.

programme.title: Happy Halloween
programme.desc: Boo! Its spooky season, and what better way to get into the spirit than with affordable, party-friendly Halloween dishes that scream trick or treat?! But be warned, these meals are scary good.

programme.title: Sweater Weather
programme.desc: The air is crisp and the leaves are changing, which means its time to gather round the dinner table for hearty, seasonal meals on a budget. These warm dishes are sure to keep you cozy all season long.

programme.title: Bacon My Heart
programme.desc: Versatility is important. These three items - bacon, eggs, and a whole chicken - will feed you a plethora of delicious meals... and for cheap!

programme.title: Traveling for Your Tastebuds
programme.desc: You dont have to travel half way around the world to try a different cuisine - Italian and Filipino foods are accessible right here, right now.
