programme.title: Spooky Season
programme.desc: The fog is rolling in, which means its time for the spooky season! But dont you worry, because youll be able to keep those ghosts and skeletons happy with all the spooky eats and scary treats in this episode of Tastemades Recipe Rundown!

programme.title: Trick or Treats for Kids
programme.desc: Whether you have kids or are a kid at heart, these whimsical Halloween treats are delicious, easy bakes. From leftover Halloween candy bark to ghosty treats and monster cakes. These recipes are perfect to make with little ones.

programme.title: Hair-raising Halloween Cakes
programme.desc: Join Mia if you DARE for these Halloween cakes are sure to SCARE! Blood red velvet cake, marshmallow spiderwebs, bubbling caldrons and a cake that bites back will inspire some serious spooky vibes. Mia will seriously impress and teach you new skills

programme.title: Spooky Halloween Party Bakes
programme.desc: Make your Halloween Party the talk of every boy and ghoul in the neighborhood! Whether its the poisoned apples, the drippy candle cakes, coffin pies or savory treats (or tricks) these delicious bakes will surely delight and scare.

programme.title: Spooktacular Tricks and Treats
programme.desc: Dont let the line of trick-or-treaters or the candy corn overload scare you out of the kitchen this Halloween. Frankies got tricks up his sleeve to make simple yet wicked good treats for everyone at the party to enjoy. All while saving some dough.

programme.title: Happy Halloween
programme.desc: Boo! Its spooky season, and what better way to get into the spirit than with affordable, party-friendly Halloween dishes that scream trick or treat?! But be warned, these meals are scary good.

programme.title: Frankies Italian Faves
programme.desc: Everyone knows Frankie cant live without pasta, but this week he shares his favorite Italian recipes that dont require any kneading. Add these simple, delicious dishes to your weeknight menu to complete your Italian dish repertoire.

programme.title: Apocalypse Burgers
programme.desc: Chef Dale Talde kicks the summer off right with a burger blowout featuring Brisket Burgers with Grilled Onions and Blue Cheese, Shrimp Burgers with XO Sauce and a Fried Egg, and Lamb Sliders with Feta Ranch and dont forget the Lemon Oregano Fries.

programme.title: Sausage Egg And Cheese All Day Long
programme.desc: Chef Dale Talde brings out the best of brunch with sweet and savory hits such as Bacon Wrapped Dates Stuffed with Chorizo, Maple Sausage, Egg, And Cheese Fried Rice, and the tastiest BBQ Duck, Egg, And Corn Scallion Pancake Sandwiches youve ever eaten.

programme.title: Summer Surf n Turf
programme.desc: Chef Dale Talde kicks lobster And steak to the curb as he puts a Spanish-style spin on your typical surf n turf by creating Pork And Clams, Lobster and Mushroom Fideos, and Tomato And Tuna Bread then washing it all down with a tasty Michelada.

programme.title: Perfectly Prepared Steaks
programme.desc: Big Daddy Dale Talde shows you how to marinate, prep, And grill up the biggest and best steaks out there. From a Hanger Steak with Salsa Verde to a Ribeye with Ginger Chili Relish, and tops it all off with the father of all steaks The Porterhouse.

programme.title: Pizza Party on the Grill
programme.desc: Its Pizza Time! Chef Dale Talde grills up amazing pizzas for every palate including a Detroit Style Pie, a Cheddar Naan Pie with a Spiced Chick Peas And Potatoes, and gives your childhood favorite French Bread Pizza a much needed upgrade.

programme.title: Grill These Sandwiches
programme.desc: Mad Good Food Host Derrell Smith joins Chef Dale Talde at the grill as they cook up some stupendous sandwiches including a Salmon Pastrami Reuben, a Meatball Banh Mi, and even some Grilled Ice Cream Sandwiches.

programme.title: New Orleans-Style Shrimp And Oysters
programme.desc: Chef Dale Talde brings us to the bayou as he creates a NOLA-inspired menu complete with Chargrilled Oysters, Black Pepper Shrimp Poboys, finishes it off with Bananas Foster, and washes it all down with a Fruity Grilled Hurricane.

programme.title: Sunday Vietnamese Brisket with Noodles
programme.desc: Chef Dale Talde shows us how he does Sunday up right as he grills up some Vietnamese Brisket with Rice Noodles, Crispy Swordfish Summer Rolls, and tops it all off with some tasty Soju Floats. Hey, its Sunday somewhere, right?

programme.title: Beer Brats And BBQ Ribs
programme.desc: Chef Dale Talde grills up summer favorites perfect for any backyard BBQ. Cheddar beer brats in a pretzel bun, BBQ lamb ribs with Chinese mustard sauce, watermelon lime soju punch, And warm donuts with grilled strawberries And whipped cream for dessert.

programme.title: Bougie Badass Burgers
programme.desc: Chef Dale Talde brings your basic burgers to a new level with his dry-aged beef burger with potatoes and truffle dijon mayo, a part-beef part-pork belly burger with cheddar And an egg, and lastly a crispy mushroom tortilla burger with salsa And cheese.

programme.title: Feast of Killer Crab And Perfect Pork Belly
programme.desc: Chef Dale Talde prepares a finger food feast with char grilled chili crab, spiced adobo potatoes, grilled pork belly, And sofrito stuffed branzino all served on a bed of rice over banana leaves. Call your friends - this is a feast that will feed many!

programme.title: Secret Pizza
programme.desc: With the help of a guide, Stephanie Izard explores the underground secret pizzas of Los Angeles, including an off-menu pizza at a cinnamon bun pop-up, apartment-cooked limited drop specials and gourmet sourdough pies made in pizza vans mobile oven.

programme.title: Life After Restaurants
programme.desc: From backyard mariscos to Cantonese remixes of British hand pies to made-to-order slap noodles, Stephanie catches hangs with 3 chefs who left the traditional restaurant scene and found alternative ways to cook for a living and make the food they love

programme.title: Farm Forward Cooking
programme.desc: From a chef creating dishes that combine her Mexican and Indigenous heritage to a pizza pop up that improvs with farmers market ingredients to a backyard-run Indigenous dinner series, Stephanie Izard meets cooks taking their lead from the land.

programme.title: Origins to Originals
programme.desc: From roast chicken to smash burgers to hot sauce, Stephanie Izard meets three different chefs putting their own California-inspired spin on food from their heritage by remixing traditional recipes that center local, fresh ingredients.

programme.title: Unique Eats
programme.desc: From a chef making Italian pasta with Mexican flavors to a groundbreaking functional cocktail bar to a couple that roasts whole goats behind a tire shop, Stephanie Izard finds unique eateries serving up one-of-a-kind food.

programme.title: Family Style

programme.title: New Orleans-Style Shrimp And Oysters

programme.title: Lunches for Work
programme.desc: A big way to save money is to prepare homemade lunches for work. Frankie shows us how to make five delicious lunches for the whole work week. Youll be saving money, and you might even be more productive at work after a nutritious homemade lunch!

programme.title: The Weekly Struggle Budget
programme.desc: Frankie figured out the weekly budget grocery equation so you dont have to. Breakfast, lunch, and dinner for seven days, for a family of four, for under $150. All it takes is a little planning, meal prep, and using up leftovers in inventive ways.

programme.title: An Eggplant Extravaganza
programme.desc: Eggplant: A fruit you didnt know was a fruit. Often underrated and overlooked, Frankie shows us how to shop for and cook this filling, delicious, cost-effective, and versatile ingredient. The days of mushy, bitter eggplant will be long gone.

programme.title: Wrap it Up!
programme.desc: First, Frankie packs a one-two punch of bargain and nutrition with butternut squash in three nostalgic, old school dishes. Then he shows you how to prep portable wraps at home for easy, peasey lunches.

programme.title: Spooky Season
programme.desc: The fog is rolling in, which means its time for the spooky season! But dont you worry, because youll be able to keep those ghosts and skeletons happy with all the spooky eats and scary treats in this episode of Tastemades Recipe Rundown!

programme.title: Trick or Treats for Kids
programme.desc: Whether you have kids or are a kid at heart, these whimsical Halloween treats are delicious, easy bakes. From leftover Halloween candy bark to ghosty treats and monster cakes. These recipes are perfect to make with little ones.

programme.title: Hair-raising Halloween Cakes
programme.desc: Join Mia if you DARE for these Halloween cakes are sure to SCARE! Blood red velvet cake, marshmallow spiderwebs, bubbling caldrons and a cake that bites back will inspire some serious spooky vibes. Mia will seriously impress and teach you new skills

programme.title: Spooky Halloween Party Bakes
programme.desc: Make your Halloween Party the talk of every boy and ghoul in the neighborhood! Whether its the poisoned apples, the drippy candle cakes, coffin pies or savory treats (or tricks) these delicious bakes will surely delight and scare.

programme.title: Spooktacular Tricks and Treats
programme.desc: Dont let the line of trick-or-treaters or the candy corn overload scare you out of the kitchen this Halloween. Frankies got tricks up his sleeve to make simple yet wicked good treats for everyone at the party to enjoy. All while saving some dough.

programme.title: Happy Halloween
programme.desc: Boo! Its spooky season, and what better way to get into the spirit than with affordable, party-friendly Halloween dishes that scream trick or treat?! But be warned, these meals are scary good.

programme.title: Frankies Italian Faves
programme.desc: Everyone knows Frankie cant live without pasta, but this week he shares his favorite Italian recipes that dont require any kneading. Add these simple, delicious dishes to your weeknight menu to complete your Italian dish repertoire.

programme.title: Apocalypse Burgers
programme.desc: Chef Dale Talde kicks the summer off right with a burger blowout featuring Brisket Burgers with Grilled Onions and Blue Cheese, Shrimp Burgers with XO Sauce and a Fried Egg, and Lamb Sliders with Feta Ranch and dont forget the Lemon Oregano Fries.

programme.title: Solo YOLO

programme.title: La Trepadora - S01:E083
programme.desc: Hilario advierte a Moncho que, para volver a ganarse su confianza, deber hacer todo lo que el le pida sin importar de que se trate. Florencia le pide a Nicols que se queden trabajando sus tierras para demostrarle a los Guanipa que no les temen y que, cuando el sienta que la ama, se casen por la iglesia. Ya en su casa, Hilario trata de explicarle a Victoria que se equivoca al pensar que Florencia es ms importante que ella para el, le ruega a Victoria que lo perdone; pero la muchacha, que est demasiado herida, se marcha de Cantarrana asegurando que ya no lo puede ver como su padre.Adelaida se complace al ver lo que se ha esmerado Hansen por preparar la velada para compartir con ella. Victoria le confiesa a Clementina lo mucho que le duele sentir que ya no puede estar orgullosa de ser la hija de Hilario Guanipa como siempre lo hizo.

programme.title: La Trepadora - S01:E084
programme.desc: Adelaida y Hansen hacen el amor por primera vez. Hilario quiere reconciliase con Adelaida para que ella lo ayude a recuperar el afecto de Victoria. Victoria le revela a Nicols que Florencia le hizo creer a Hilario que lo quera para obtener parte de las tierras de Cantarrana.

programme.title: Piel Salvaje - S01:E94
programme.desc: Anton se lleva secuestrado a Ezequiel y avisa a Fausto, para que tenga el placer de matarlo. Bajo engao citan a Amelia y Sebastin para hacer razonar a Fausto que liberen a Ezequiel, de lo contrario ella y su hijo por nacer, morirn.

programme.title: Piel Salvaje - S01:E95
programme.desc: Ezequiel y Fausto, enfrentados. Camila intenta convencer a Roger de que suelten a Ezequiel. La situacion se complica pes Amelia, detenida como rehen y acompaada por Sebastin, ya presenta dolores de parto.

programme.title: El Desprecio - S01:E114
programme.desc: Pastora, in Illis room, analyzes in which flask to dilute an acid with which she intends to deform her twin.

programme.title: El Desprecio - S01:E115
programme.desc: Pretending to be offended, Tamara loudly complains about having to sleep with Gabriel when she enters his room, Baron kisses her in order to shut her up.

programme.title: Corazon Traicionado - S01:E114
programme.desc: The housekeeper confronts Lorena to make her admit that she still loves Alberto and she evades by saying that she is Omars girlfriend. Then it is Lorena who confronts Norma to make her tell the truth about what she knows, and the latter, although terrified, ends up confessing that Gertrudis did murder Paco; but she cannot say anything because she has a death threat against her.

programme.title: Te Tengo en Salsa - S01:E90
programme.desc: Raiza se complace en ver la cara de sorpresa de Cesar, quien, al reaccionar, la toma del brazo con fuerza para sacarla del lugar.

programme.title: Te Tengo en Salsa - S01:E91
programme.desc: En un nuevo da; Salvatore advierte a Nacho que quiere que acabe con Adriana ese mismo da.

programme.title: Te Tengo en Salsa - S01:E92
programme.desc: Carlos Ral relata que encontro a Adriana sentada en el piso, con una pistola en la mano al lado del cuerpo ensangrentado de Azalea.

programme.title: La Trepadora - S01:E084
programme.desc: Adelaida y Hansen hacen el amor por primera vez. Hilario quiere reconciliase con Adelaida para que ella lo ayude a recuperar el afecto de Victoria. Victoria le revela a Nicols que Florencia le hizo creer a Hilario que lo quera para obtener parte de las tierras de Cantarrana.

programme.title: La Trepadora - S01:E085
programme.desc: Victoria advierte a su padre que no quiere su dinero; el est seguro de que ella terminar pidiendole ayuda economica tarde o temprano. Yosmir y Chabeto acuden al desfile de moda al que asisten Eugenia y Antonieta en el club. Hilario advierte a Hansen que ahora son enemigos. Victoria conoce a Sergio Escalante.

programme.title: Piel Salvaje - S01:E95
programme.desc: Ezequiel y Fausto, enfrentados. Camila intenta convencer a Roger de que suelten a Ezequiel. La situacion se complica pes Amelia, detenida como rehen y acompaada por Sebastin, ya presenta dolores de parto.

programme.title: Piel Salvaje - S01:E96
programme.desc: Sebastin, esquivando los disparos de Anton, lleva a Amelia al hospital. All nace el bebe de ambos. Fausto se lleva nuevamente a Ezequiel como su rehen. Fausto y Patricia se emocionan al conocer a su nieto y Amelia le pide a su padre, que honre su palabra de dejar libre a Ezequiel.

programme.title: El Desprecio - S01:E115
programme.desc: Pretending to be offended, Tamara loudly complains about having to sleep with Gabriel when she enters his room, Baron kisses her in order to shut her up.

programme.title: El Desprecio - S01:E116
programme.desc: Amado threatens Lucely with death for stopping him in front of Raul, Octavia and the police. Linares begs Caballero to spare his life.

programme.title: Corazon Traicionado - S01:E115
programme.desc: Opening a drawer, Malena finds a picture frame with broken glass, with an old photo of her and Isabel. Alfonso arrives and discovers it, but Malena reacts with great annoyance towards him - Norma is about to leave the room, with the gun hidden inside a laundry basket, when she is surprised by the arrival of Gertrudis.

programme.title: Corazon Traicionado - S01:E116
programme.desc: Lorena meets Alberto in a cafe and he takes the opportunity to inform her that his relationship with Patricia is over. Lorena already knew, she summons him to tell him that Norma found the gun with which Gertrudis killed Paco and Marco Aurelio - Virginias psychiatrist will issue a favorable report, he considers that she is fit to raise her son - Omar discovers Lorena meeting with Alberto and jealousy takes over him.

programme.desc: En un nuevo da; Salvatore advierte a Nacho que quiere que acabe con Adriana ese mismo da.

programme.desc: Sebastin, esquivando los disparos de Anton, lleva a Amelia al hospital. All nace el bebe de ambos. Fausto se lleva nuevamente a Ezequiel como su rehen. Fausto y Patricia se emocionan al conocer a su nieto y Amelia le pide a su padre, que honre su palabra de dejar libre a Ezequiel.

programme.title: El Desprecio - S01:E115
programme.desc: Pretending to be offended, Tamara loudly complains about having to sleep with Gabriel when she enters his room, Baron kisses her in order to shut her up.

programme.title: El Desprecio - S01:E116
programme.desc: Amado threatens Lucely with death for stopping him in front of Raul, Octavia and the police. Linares begs Caballero to spare his life.

programme.title: Corazon Traicionado - S01:E115
programme.desc: Opening a drawer, Malena finds a picture frame with broken glass, with an old photo of her and Isabel. Alfonso arrives and discovers it, but Malena reacts with great annoyance towards him - Norma is about to leave the room, with the gun hidden inside a laundry basket, when she is surprised by the arrival of Gertrudis.

programme.title: Corazon Traicionado - S01:E116
programme.desc: Lorena meets Alberto in a cafe and he takes the opportunity to inform her that his relationship with Patricia is over. Lorena already knew, she summons him to tell him that Norma found the gun with which Gertrudis killed Paco and Marco Aurelio - Virginias psychiatrist will issue a favorable report, he considers that she is fit to raise her son - Omar discovers Lorena meeting with Alberto and jealousy takes over him.

programme.title: Te Tengo en Salsa - S01:E91
programme.desc: En un nuevo da; Salvatore advierte a Nacho que quiere que acabe con Adriana ese mismo da.

programme.title: La Trepadora - S01:E084

programme.title: La Trepadora - S01:E085

programme.title: Savage Wild - S04:E04 - Pitch Black
programme.desc: Manny explores a primitive river in pitch black darkness And encounters a monster.

programme.title: Man Eats Wild - S02:E01 - Man Eating Crocodiles of Zimbabwe
programme.desc: Mario takes a huge gamble by rafting along Africas most dangerous river, the Zambezi, heading towards Lake Reba. But he ends up face-to-face with some of the largest and most fearsome man-eating crocodiles around.

programme.title: Man Eats Wild - S02:E02 - Namibian Desert Oryx
programme.desc: Mario heard from some locals about a strange-looking creature deep in the Namibian desert. So, he decided to brave the sweltering heat in a hot air balloon to track down the oryx.

programme.title: Man Eats Wild - S02:E03 - Kalahari Bushmen
programme.desc: In the Kalahari desert, theres an old tribe living off the land. Mario spends a week working hard to gather food to share with them.

programme.title: Man Eats Wild - S02:E04 - Untouched Atolls
programme.desc: Just off the coast of Africa is a strip of 115 islands called the Seychelles. Mario educates his audience as to how to fish for reef species. Out of know where he even attempts to swim with a sailfish.

programme.title: Savage Wild - S04:E01 - Manny Goes Medieval
programme.desc: Manny demonstrates his medieval skills, taking a huge wild boar with Viking-style spears.

programme.title: Savage Wild - S04:E02 - Drought and Danger
programme.desc: Manny investigates how severe drought has caused wildlife to congregate near any water.

programme.title: Savage Wild - S04:E03 - Black Bear Explosion
programme.desc: Manny explores a Florida swamp swarming with black bears.

programme.title: Savage Wild - S04:E04 - Pitch Black
programme.desc: Manny explores a primitive river in pitch black darkness And encounters a monster.

programme.title: Sasquatch Mountain Man - S02:E13 - Best of Season 2
programme.desc: We take a look back at Laramy Sasquatch Millers adventures from this season.

programme.title: Royal Documentaries - S01:E34 - Prince William And Prince Harry The Next Royal Generation
programme.desc: Prince William and Prince Harry, along with their friends, got as much media attention as todays pop stars, fashion icons, and movie celebs. This documentary explores how this affected their personal lives and friendships, showcasing how they managed their fame alongside their royal responsibilities.

programme.title: Dropped - S06:E09 - The LZ
programme.desc: Chris and Casey Keefer must push to reach the LZ with a failing raft. With only a few hours before extraction, will Mother Nature get the best of them before they can get to safety?

programme.title: Dropped - S06:E10 - After the Drop
programme.desc: Back from their punishing experience in the New Zealand wilderness brothers Chris and Casey Keefer sit down to discuss the ups, downs and pivotal moments from their recent adventure.

programme.title: Wardens - S03:E02 - Operation Water Rescue
programme.desc: In this episode, some wardens are handling early season fishermen about the gaming rules, and others are picking up skills for open water rescues.

programme.title: Alaskas Ultimate Bush Pilots - S01:E06 - Training Day
programme.desc: Island Air is the lifeline to many in Kodiak. Sometimes the violent weather prevents the planes from landing so Erik takes the day to teach Pete how to use the camera hatch for a little target practice.

programme.title: Close Quarter Battle - S01:E07 - S.W.A.T.
programme.desc: In 1968, a new form of military policing was being developed in a rural area north of Los Angeles. The Los Angeles Police Department sent an observer to this unit, and he, in turn, took this knowledge back to the LAPD. This contributed to the development of the departments first Special Weapons and Tactics (S.W.A.T.) team. This CQB episode takes an historical journey to examine how this incident affected and changed police tactics around the world. Using CQBs trademark "sub-second" analysis, the program also looks at how police S.W.A.T. teams train, plan and equip themselves for the challenges of urban combat. The dramatization of a 1980s S.W.A.T. siege of a gang safe-house demonstrates the complicated challenge of protecting innocent people who might be caught in the line of fi re, as well as the specifics of the squads training regimen, how they communicated, and the special equipment they used.

programme.title: Savage Wild - S05:E09 - Save a Watermelon Kill a Boar Part 2
programme.desc: After slaying a monster boar, Manny heads back into the forest and goes toe to toe with an even bigger boar.

programme.title: Savage Wild - S05:E10 - How to Stop a Charging Wild Boar
programme.desc: In this episode of Savage Wild, were headed into the palmettos with Full Rut Outfitters in search of wild boar.

programme.title: Carters W.A.R. - S02:E07 - Sold into Slavery
programme.desc: Ivan is investigating the illegal trade of bush meat in Kinshasa, when he stumbles upon three captive baby chimpanzees being sold on the black market. A dramatic rescue is planned that sees the chimps safely delivered to a place dedicated to providing a better future for all primates in Africa.

programme.title: Royal Documentaries - S01:E38 - HM The Queen A Remarkable Life
programme.desc: The most notable woman in modern times has to be our Late Queen, Elizabeth II. She ruled for 70 years, the longest reign in British history. Once a princess who wasnt supposed to be queen, Elizabeth II led the country to thrive after World War II and became a steady presence in our changing world. In a thousand years of British monarchy, Elizabeth II is likely one of the most outstanding monarchs ever.

programme.title: Royal Documentaries - S01:E41 - Fergie The Downfall Of A Modern Duchess
programme.desc: This is the story about Sarah Ferguson, once known as Her Royal Highness, Duchess of York. But now, shes not really involved with the royals. She was someone who seemingly had it all but lost it when her name was linked to a big scandal.

programme.title: Dropped - S07:E01 - Survival Mode
programme.desc: In the season premiere, brothers Chris and Casey Keefer are back in the Saskatchewan bushland to test their survival skillsand it might be their last time. They are desperate to find a safe spot for shelter, and clash over their first catch.

programme.title: Dropped - S07:E02 - Game Plan
programme.desc: With base camp set up and the cold setting in, Chris and Casey must find foodfast. Their energy levels are depleting as they begin their hunt for moose. As time ticks on, the brothers must think on their feet to find foodor risk going hungry.

programme.title: Wardens - S03:E03 - Operation Paddlefish
programme.desc: Wardens come across a group after catching some antler poachers, clamp down on fishermen trying to cheat during paddlefish season, and one warden handles a lively bunch of partying campers.

programme.title: Alaskas Ultimate Bush Pilots - S01:E07 - Surfs Up
programme.desc: Rough seas have a couple of surfers turning to Island Air for an adventure of a life time.

programme.title: Close Quarter Battle - S01:E08 - Hunting Sarajevo Snipers
programme.desc: The Bosnian War was an extraordinarily complex event, with many layers of military involvement including NATO forces, national militaries, irregular paramilitary forces, mujahedeen revolutionaries, private security companies, and international intelligence personnel. One tactic in particular struck fear into the hearts of the military and civilians alike: the use of snipers positioned in high buildings. This edition of CQB investigates this specific combat technique and how it was countered by opposing forces. Taking viewers inside a "snipers den," the program explains how this tactic was so successfully used by rebel forces and how traditional military techniques evolved to combat it.

programme.title: Hollywood Weapons - S01:E01 - Terrys Criminal Mind
programme.desc: A murderer tries to kill his final victim as the car they are in slowly sinks to the bottom of a lake. The only way to save the victim is to rescue her as the car continues to sink. We test fire multiple handguns underwater to see if you can actually penetrate a car windshield and save the victim.

programme.title: Hollywood Weapons - S01:E02 - Shark Go Boom!
programme.desc: In Jaws, Chief Brody hangs on to his sinking boat as a giant shark approaches him with a scuba tank lodged in its mouth. We construct a giant shark on a motorized platform to test if you can hit, and explode, the tank with an M1 Garand rifle while perched in a precarious position.

programme.title: Carters W.A.R. - S02:E08 - The Forgotten Giants
programme.desc: Not all poaching is for horns and tusks. In many parts of poverty-stricken Africa, giraffes are killed mercilessly for their meat. Ivan joins a specialized team in exploring radical solutions to both save the giraffe and provide food to communities in need.

programme.title: Royal Documentaries - S01:E42 - Diana A Model Princess
programme.desc: Dianas fashion sense was something people often looked at closely. She had a knack for picking outfits that were both stylish and sophisticated, which always grabbed attention. Her hats were another standout feature; she often wore elegant designs that added a touch of grace to her look. Her hair was also iconic, usually styled neatly with a slight bounce, perfectly framing her face and adding to her elegant appearance.

programme.title: Royal Documentaries - S01:E41 - Fergie The Downfall Of A Modern Duchess
programme.desc: This is the story about Sarah Ferguson, once known as Her Royal Highness, Duchess of York. But now, shes not really involved with the royals. She was someone who seemingly had it all but lost it when her name was linked to a big scandal.

programme.title: Dropped - S07:E01 - Survival Mode
programme.desc: In the season premiere, brothers Chris and Casey Keefer are back in the Saskatchewan bushland to test their survival skillsand it might be their last time. They are desperate to find a safe spot for shelter, and clash over their first catch.

programme.title: Dropped - S07:E02 - Game Plan
programme.desc: With base camp set up and the cold setting in, Chris and Casey must find foodfast. Their energy levels are depleting as they begin their hunt for moose. As time ticks on, the brothers must think on their feet to find foodor risk going hungry.

programme.title: The Inside Line - S05:E41 - 23 September 2025
programme.desc: McLaren is off to Singapore, needing only 13 points to clinch its second consecutive constructors title, marking its first back-to-back wins since the glory days with Honda from 1988 to 1991.

programme.title: E1 Highlights - S02:E04 - Lake Maggiore
programme.desc: Team Brady, led by Tom Brady, grabbed their first victory of the 2025 season with awesome efforts from Sam Coleman and Emma Kimilainen, who stood out in qualifying and the preliminary race.

programme.title: F1 H2O - S02:E01 - F1H2O GP OF INDONESIA
programme.desc: This event kicked off the 2025 UIM F1H2O World Championship, taking place on the exciting Lake Toba in Balige, Indonesia, from August 22 to 24, 2025.

programme.title: The Football Review - S05:E71 - 22 September 2025
programme.desc: Almost 25 years after his first time with Benfica, Jose Mourinho is returning to his old stomping grounds, signing on for another period with the Portuguese club.

programme.title: E1 Highlights - S02:E01 - Jeddah
programme.desc: Dani Clos and Mashael Alobaidan led Aoki Racing to win both group-stage races. Even after losing the first final, they managed to grab the overall win, with Steve Aoki celebrating right by the track.

programme.title: Racing on the Edge - S02:E07
programme.desc: With the SailGP season reaching its halfway mark, the pressure to deliver consistent results mounts for every team. In this episode, cameras follow Tom Slingsbys Australia SailGP Team as they try to maintain their championship lead while rivals sharpen their tactics.

programme.title: Racing On The Edge - S02:E09 - International "Penalty Point"
programme.desc: Dealing with a never-before-seen penalty points situation and some chaos within, Team Germany is determined to show what theyre made of on their own turf. They learn that winning is just as much about the adventure as it is about crossing the finish line first.

programme.title: Racing on the Edge - S02:E10 - Breaking Point The Sassnitz Miracle
programme.desc: Storms, accidents, and an all-time record storm put the SailGP teams to the test. But after a miraculous repair, Frances Quentin Delapierre made a remarkable comeback and won in Sassnitz.

programme.title: E1 - S02:E07 - Re-Live Lake Maggiore Place Race and Finals
programme.desc: Tight merges and tactical racing made Final 1 an exciting showdown, with commentators calling it "the tightest merge weve ever seen."

programme.title: E1 Champions of the Water - S02:E06 - Monaco
programme.desc: Team Rafa, leading the championship, rolls into Monaco as the top contenders. However, the competition takes place right under the watchful eye of sporting great and team owner, Rafa Nadal. This isnt your typical weekendits a standout event in the chronicles of E1 racing.

programme.title: E1 - S02:E06 - UIM E1-Weltmeisterschaft in Dubrovnik
programme.desc: Get ready for more heart-racing action as the UIM E1 World Championship took over Dubrovniks Adriatic Sea on June 1314, 2025. With the historic city walls and beautiful sights of the UNESCO Old Town, the famous RaceBird boats zoomed at 50 knots, making it an unforgettable event

programme.title: E1 Champions of the Water - S02:E02 - Doha
programme.desc: Behindthescenes access with both Team Rafa and Aoki Racingfrom strategy sessions to final adrenaline-fuelled showdown

programme.title: FIBA World Basketball - S01:E48 - 24 September 2025
programme.desc: Germanys strong teamwork helped them win the FIBA EuroBasket title after their success at the 2023 World Cup.

programme.title: Silverstone Festival 2025 - S01:E01 - Episode 1
programme.desc: Relive the opening action from the final Silverstone Festival in style. From packed Formula Junior grids to thundering Group C prototypes and stunning GT classics, Part One delivers wheel-to-wheel racing and golden moments on Britains most famous circuit. A celebration of 75 years of Formula 1 and legendary machines sets the tone for an unforgettable weekend.

programme.title: Silverstone Festival 2025 - S01:E02 - Episode 2
programme.desc: The finale of the Silverstone Festival brings the drama to a close with historic touring cars, endurance legends, and the Tourist Trophy showdown. Off the track, fans enjoyed record car club displays, live music, and the iconic World Champions Collection. Part Two captures the excitement, passion, and spectacle of the last ever Silverstone Festival.

programme.title: The Football Review - S05:E73 - 29 September 2025
programme.desc: This season, Liverpool has gotten into the routine of making last-minute comebacks, figuring out how to turn potential losses into wins when it looked like they might falter.

programme.title: E1 Highlights - S02:E05 - Monaco
programme.desc: Experience the thrill of electric foiling at almost 50 knots with Monacos beautiful skyline as your backdrop, and dont miss the eco-focused talks happening around the event.
